name: ball-ble
notes:
why not use yarn to knit more yarn? ball-ble is a little bit silly but very cute and fun. twisted rib and travelling stitches create a yarn-like texture on the tiniest ball of yarn you ever did see.

**yarn:** oddments of fingering / 4ply weight yarn.

**gauge:** n/a

**needles & notions:**
2.5mm dpns (note: you could also use a long circular needle for magic loop, but since the pattern is worked in 3 sections, it lends itself to dpns)
stitch markers
tapestry needle
card for ‘ballband’
stuffing


**sizing:** finished bauble measures approx 3.25 “ / 8 cm tall.

@lilykatemakes | #ball-ble
